CutSceneText.Text: Most important thing is Surkana Generator. Destroy it first or mission is over.
Use Defence Shield Generator in Gravitation Control Room. This makes a shield in front of the Drop Waiting Room.
There is a Teleporter Generator in the Fighter Waiting Room.
Use it to teleport to the central area from the Emergency Exit, nyerk, nyerk.
When you kill Adjutant Kundhan, you'll see a teleportation device that will take you to the Captain's Cabin.
It is well known that Balaur crew will collapse without their leader...
...so you will plunge all of Dredgion into chaos when you kill Captain Adhati.
